name: async-request-builder
description: async-request-agent converts JSON specified async requests into methods that return promises
author: Matt Vasallo <vasallom@gmail.com>

scripts.beautify: find . -name "*.js" -or -name "*.json" -or -name "*.html" | grep -v -e node_modules -e dist | xargs js-beautify --replace --config build/config/.jsbeautifyrc || exit 1
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run preProcess && npm run webpack || exit 1
scripts.lint: jshint --config build/config/.jshintrc build lib examples || exit 1
scripts.preProcess: npm run beautify && npm run lint || exit 1
scripts.test: npm run build && jest && npm run coverage
